channel.title: SpecHandler Error - Rewards
channel.description:
Yes, it's odd a good coder has to have error help, but... yeah...
While doing this tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,127592.0.html I got 46 errors - all doing the same thing.
It can't find the variable specialHandler. Now, I know this means it can't vind the file specialHandler, but it is right there in my server file...
Help, pl0x? ++ To helper, and a chance for BETA on my server, right now.
